responses.gpt4: Thank you for confirming, Ms. Aguirre. I've noted your question about the potential need for dialysis. Your care team will review this and get back to you soon. Is there anything else you would like to discuss?
responses.our_model: Thank you, Ms. Aguirre. I've made a note of your concern for your care team to review. They will be able to provide more detailed guidance based on your specific situation. Now, let's discuss your medications. You're currently prescribed Metformin 500 mg once a day. Have you been taking this medication as prescribed?
